text: Tijerina is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Arturo de la Garza Tijerina (born 1958), Mexican politician *Felix Tijerina (1905–1965), Mexican-American restaurateur, activist and philanthropist *Marco Aurelio Martínez Tijerina (1964/65–2010), Mexican journalist *Reies Tijerina (1926–2015), American activist *Tano Tijerina (born 1974), American rancher and businessman
title: Tijerina
